metadata.title: The Merger Announcement
metadata.subtitle: Lite
metadata.description: Your company merges with a competitor. Roles blur, influence shifts, and survival instincts rise. Every choice reveals how you navigate uncertainty, shifting power, visibility, and loyalty in a politically charged transition.
metadata.hint: Tests Power Dynamics Intelligence, Change Adaptability, Team Loyalty, and Visibility Strategy.

dimensions.label: Power Dynamics Intelligence
dimensions.description: Your ability to sense alliances, hidden agendas, and shifting influence during uncertain transitions.

dimensions.label: Change Adaptability
dimensions.description: How you interpret and adapt to ambiguity, shifting structures, and organizational disruption.

dimensions.label: Loyalty Orientation
dimensions.description: How you balance team protection, self-preservation, and shared responsibility.

dimensions.label: Visibility Strategy
dimensions.description: How you manage influence, visibility, and presence during organizational change.

scenes.label: Scene 1
scenes.title: The Rumor Begins
scenes.body:
9:42 AM. A colleague whispers:

“Leadership has been in closed meetings all week. Something big is happening.”

Your inbox instantly pings with a mandatory all-hands invite for 2 PM.
scenes.tip: Your first instinct reveals how you calibrate trust and information.

options.label: A
options.desc: You verify sources and map the information flow.

scenes.label: Scene 2
scenes.title: The Announcement
scenes.body:
2:00 PM. The CEO appears on screen, composed but tense.

“We are merging with TechCore. Integration begins next month.”

The call ends. Silence fills the room.
scenes.tip: Your reaction shows how you frame major transitions.

options.label: B
options.main: Assess the impact on your role.

options.label: C
options.desc: You spot uncertainty and blind spots.

options.label: D
options.main: Think about how the team will cope.

scenes.label: Scene 3
scenes.title: The Alliance Proposal
scenes.body:
Hours later, three colleagues approach you privately:

“We should form a group. Share information. Protect each other.”
scenes.tip: Your decision shows how you navigate informal alliances.

options.label: A
options.desc: You align with emerging power clusters.

scenes.label: Scene 4
scenes.title: The Insider Warning
scenes.body:
That night, your manager messages you privately:

“Restructuring is real. Be visible. Document your wins.”
scenes.tip: Your response shows how you balance personal effort and team loyalty.

options.label: A
options.main: Act immediately and secure your advantage.

options.label: B
options.main: Share the warning with a teammate.
options.desc: You extend your safety net outward.

options.label: C
options.main: Ask if you can share this info.

options.label: D
options.main: Wait for official details before acting.

scenes.label: Scene 5
scenes.title: The Team Question
scenes.body:
Next morning. The team gathers. Someone asks:

“Do you know anything? Are our jobs safe?”
scenes.tip: Your choice reveals your loyalty pattern.

options.label: B
options.main: “There may be changes. Let’s stay strong.”

options.label: C
options.main: Share emotional truth but not details.

scenes.label: Scene 6
scenes.title: The Visibility Moment
scenes.body: A major integration meeting is coming. Leadership will attend. High visibility, high stakes.

options.label: A
options.main: Volunteer to present your team’s wins.

options.label: C
options.main: Attend quietly and focus on execution.
options.desc: You rely on merit over airtime.

options.label: D
options.main: Send your ideas privately to leadership.

scenes.label: Scene 7
scenes.title: The Transition Decision
scenes.body:
Leadership calls you in:

“Your role is changing. A new division awaits, or a lateral move if you prefer stability.”
scenes.tip: Your path forward defines your change arc.

options.label: A
options.desc: You embrace the unknown with confidence.

growthSuggestions.text: You may overlook subtle influence patterns. Strengthen your ability to read alliances and informal power structures.
Large transitions feel destabilizing. Build habits that help you reframe disruption as possibility.
Your strong team loyalty can lead to self-sacrifice. Balance care with self-preservation.
You may underestimate the importance of being seen. Strategic visibility protects your role during transitions.
You are learning to navigate complexity with increasing maturity. Continue refining your influence and adaptability.
